item.title: Hurricane Melissa live updates: Jamaica braces for its worst storm in history
item.description: Hurricane Melissa, now a powerful Category 5 storm, is set to be Jamaica's worst storm in history.

item.title: WATCH: Huge hail churns pool in Australia
item.description: Hail stones pounded a backyard pool and smashed car windscreens in Brisbane, Australia, on Sunday.

item.title: Cameroon's President Paul Biya is declared the winner of the latest election
item.description: Cameroon’s top court has declared incumbent Paul Biya, the world’s oldest president, the winner of the latest election

item.title: Trump refuses to rule out 3rd term, says he got 'perfect' MRI at Walter Reed
item.description: Speaking with reporters on board Air Force One on Monday, President Donald Trump again refused to rule out a bid for a third presidential term.

item.title: WATCH: Man struggles to walk as powerful winds hit France
item.description: Strong winds in central France made it difficult for the man seen in this video to stay upright, much less make any forward progress.
